posts.post_title: sold; T3 turkey red Kid Elberfeld Washington
posts.post_content:
sold!
two creases lower right corner, one near the upper right to his head then parallel to his back, one below his back.  You have to hold the card correctly in the light to see them.  

Very nice PSA 1 in my opinion.

Tony
Super card Tony! great price too....

thanks Chris, 

The price just got even better - $sold
